NMF Standalone
  • nmf-standalone
  • functions package
  • functions.turkish package
  • functions.turkish.tfidf_uret module
  • View page source

functions.turkish.tfidf_uret module

functions.turkish.tfidf_uret.tf_b(x)[source]

Apply binary term frequency transformation.

Parameters:

x (csr_matrix) – Input sparse matrix

Returns:

Binary TF matrix where all non-zero values become 1

Return type:

csr_matrix

functions.turkish.tfidf_uret.tf_d(x)[source]

Apply double logarithmic term frequency transformation.

Parameters:

x (csr_matrix) – Input sparse matrix

Returns:

Double log TF matrix with transformation 1 + log2(1 + log2(tf))

Return type:

csr_matrix

functions.turkish.tfidf_uret.tf_l(x)[source]

Apply logarithmic term frequency transformation.

Parameters:

x (csr_matrix) – Input sparse matrix

Returns:

Log TF matrix with transformation 1 + log2(tf)

Return type:

csr_matrix

functions.turkish.tfidf_uret.tf_L(x)[source]

Apply average-based logarithmic term frequency transformation.

Parameters:

x (csr_matrix) – Input sparse matrix

Returns:

Normalized log TF matrix using row averages

Return type:

csr_matrix

functions.turkish.tfidf_uret.idf_t(df, dokuman_sayisi)[source]

This function calculates the IDF score for a given array. Takes an array and the number of documents and returns an array.

Parameters:

  • df (ndarray)

  • dokuman_sayisi (int)

functions.turkish.tfidf_uret.idf_p(df, dokuman_sayisi)[source]

Calculate probabilistic inverse document frequency.

Parameters:

  • df (np.ndarray) – Document frequency array

  • dokuman_sayisi (int) – Total number of documents

Returns:

Probabilistic IDF scores

Return type:

np.ndarray

functions.turkish.tfidf_uret.tf_idf_generator(veri, tokenizer)[source]

This function generates a TF-IDF matrix for a given list of text data. 1) Convert the text data to a sparse matrix. 2) Calculate the TF-IDF score for the sparse matrix. 3) Return the TF-IDF matrix.

Parameters:

  • veri (list) – A list of text data.

  • tokenizer (Tokenizer) – A trained tokenizer.

Returns:

A sparse TF-IDF matrix.

Return type:

csr_matrix
